name: Karma (itch) (SaikingS, Figusorasu)
description:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Travel through Cycles of Times and make Choices that
will bend the state of World...

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Controls: 

WSAD/D-Pad - Movement
E/(A) - Interact 
H/(X) - Attack 
U/(Y) - Hookshot
